sect2.title: Installation of WvStreams
sect2.para: Install WvStreams by running the following commands:

userinput.command: patch -Np1 -i ../wvstreams-&wvstreams-version;-wvcrypto.patch && patch -Np1 -i ../wvstreams-&wvstreams-version;-wvresolver.patch && make PREFIX=/usr LDFLAGS="-lcrypt" && make PREFIX=/usr install
